verses.verse: Concerning Moab.<WH4124> Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> "Woe<WH1945> to Nebo,<WH5015> for it has been destroyed;<WH7703> Kiriathaim<WH7156> has been<WH954> put<WH954> to shame,<WH954> it has been captured;<WH3920> The lofty<WH4869> stronghold<WH4869> has been<WH954> put<WH954> to shame<WH954> and shattered.<WH2865>

"There<WH369> is praise<WH8416> for Moab<WH4124> no<WH369> longer;<WH5750> In Heshbon<WH2809> they have devised<WH2803> calamity<WH9567> against<WH5921> her: 'Come<WH1980> and let us cut<WH3772> her off<WH3772> from [being] a nation!<WH1471>' You too,<WH1571> Madmen,<WH4086> will be silenced;<WH1826> The sword<WH2719> will follow<WH310> <WH1980> after<WH310> you.
"The sound<WH6963> of an outcry<WH6818> from Horonaim,<WH2773> 'Devastation<WH7701> and great<WH1419> destruction!<WH7667>'
"Moab<WH4124> is broken,<WH7665> Her little<WH6810> ones<WH6810> have sounded<WH8085> out a cry<WH2201> [of distress.]

"For by the ascent<WH4608> of Luhith<WH3872> They will ascend<WH5927> with continual<WH1065> weeping;<WH1065> For at the descent<WH4174> of Horonaim<WH2773> They have heard<WH8085> the anguished<WH9496> cry<WH6818> of destruction.<WH7667>
"Flee,<WH5127> save<WH4422> your lives,<WH5315> That you may be like a juniper<WH6176> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

"For because<WH3282> of your trust<WH982> in your own achievements<WH4639> and treasures,<WH214> Even<WH1571> you yourself<WH9040> will be captured;<WH3920> And Chemosh<WH3645> will go<WH3318> off<WH3318> into exile<WH1473> Together<WH9191> with his priests<WH3548> and his princes.<WH8269>

"And a destroyer<WH7703> will come<WH935> to every<WH3605> city,<WH5892> So that no<WH3808> city<WH5892> will escape;<WH4422> The valley<WH6010> also will be ruined, And the plateau<WH6> will be destroyed,<WH4334> As the Lord<WH8045> has said.<WH3068>
"Give<WH5414> wings<WH9481> to Moab,<WH4124> For she will flee<WH3318> away;<WH3318> And her cities<WH5892> will become<WH1961> a desolation,<WH8047> Without<WH369> inhabitants<WH3427> in them.
"Cursed<WH779> be the one who does<WH6213> the Lord's work<WH4399> negligently,<WH9559> And cursed<WH779> be the one who restrains<WH4513> his sword<WH2719> from blood.<WH1818>

"Moab<WH4124> has been<WH7599> at ease<WH7599> since<WH4480> his youth;<WH5271> He has also been<WH8252> undisturbed<WH8252> on his lees,<WH8105> Neither<WH3808> has he been emptied<WH9553> from vessel<WH3627> to vessel,<WH3627> Nor<WH3808> has he gone<WH1980> into exile.<WH1473> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> he retains<WH5975> his flavor,<WH2940> And his aroma<WH7381> has not changed.<WH4171>

"Therefore<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> are coming,<WH935>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "when I shall send<WH7971> to him those who tip<WH6808> [vessels,<WH3627>] and they will tip<WH6808> him over,<WH6808> and they will empty<WH9553> his vessels and shatter<WH5310> his jars.<WH9311>
"And Moab<WH4124> will be ashamed<WH954> of Chemosh,<WH3645> as the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> was ashamed<WH954> of Bethel,<WH1008> their confidence.<WH4009>
"How<WH349> can you say,<WH559> 'We are mighty<WH1368> warriors,<WH1368> And men<WH376> valiant<WH2428> for battle<WH4421>'?

"Moab<WH4124> has been destroyed,<WH7703> and men have gone<WH5927> up to his cities;<WH5892> His choicest<WH4005> young<WH970> men<WH970> have also gone<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the slaughter,<WH2874>" Declares<WH5002> the King,<WH4428> whose name<WH8034> is the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
"The disaster<WH343> of Moab<WH4124> will soon<WH7138> come,<WH935> And his calamity<WH9567> has swiftly<WH3966> hastened.<WH4116>

"Mourn<WH5110> for him, all<WH3605> you who [live] around<WH5439> him, Even all<WH3605> of you who know<WH3045> his name;<WH8034> Say,<WH559> 'How<WH351> has the mighty<WH5797> scepter<WH4294> been broken,<WH7665> A staff<WH4731> of splendor!<WH8597>'

"Come<WH3381> down<WH3381> from your glory<WH9202> And sit<WH3427> on the parched<WH6772> ground,<WH6772> O daughter<WH1323> dwelling<WH3427> in Dibon,<WH1769> For the destroyer<WH7703> of Moab<WH4124> has come<WH5927> up against you, He has ruined<WH7843> your strongholds.<WH4013>

"Stand<WH5975> by the road<WH1870> and keep<WH6822> watch,<WH6822> O inhabitant<WH3427> of Aroer;<WH6177> Ask<WH7592> him who flees<WH5127> and her who escapes<WH4422> [And] say,<WH559> 'What<WH4100> has happened<WH1961>?'

"Moab<WH4124> has been<WH954> put<WH954> to shame,<WH954> for it has been<WH2865> shattered.<WH2865> Wail<WH3213> and cry<WH2199> out; Declare<WH5046> by the Arnon<WH769> That Moab<WH4124> has been destroyed.<WH7703>
"Judgment<WH4941> has also come<WH935> upon the plain,<WH4334> upon Holon,<WH2473> Jahzah,<WH3096> and against<WH5921> Mephaath,<WH4158>
against<WH5921> Dibon,<WH1769> Nebo,<WH5015> and Beth-diblathaim,
against<WH5921> Kiriathaim,<WH7156> Beth-gamul, and Beth-meon,
against<WH5921> Kerioth,<WH7152> Bozrah,<WH1224> and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the land<WH776> of Moab,<WH4124> far<WH7350> and near.<WH7138>
"The horn<WH7161> of Moab<WH4124> has been cut<WH1438> off,<WH1438> and his arm<WH2220> broken,<WH7665>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Make<WH7937> him drunk,<WH7937> for he has become<WH1431> arrogant<WH1431> toward<WH5921> the Lord;<WH3068> so Moab<WH4124> will wallow<WH5606> in his vomit,<WH9514> and he also<WH1571> will become<WH1961> a laughingstock.<WH7814>

"Now was not Israel<WH3478> a laughingstock<WH7814> to you? Or<WH518> was he caught<WH4672> among thieves<WH1590>? For each<WH1767> time<WH1767> you speak<WH1697> about him you shake<WH5110> [your head in scorn.]

"Leave<WH5800> the cities<WH5892> and dwell<WH7931> among the crags,<WH5553> O inhabitants<WH3427> of Moab,<WH4124> And be like a dove<WH3123> that nests<WH7077> Beyond<WH5676> the mouth<WH6310> of the chasm.<WH6354>
"We have heard<WH8085> of the pride<WH1347> of Moab<WH4124> – he [is] very<WH3966> proud<WH1343> – Of his haughtiness,<WH7312> his pride,<WH1347> his arrogance<WH1346> and his self-exaltation.
"I know<WH3045> his fury,<WH5678>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "But it is futile<WH3808>;<WH9210> His idle<WH907> boasts<WH907> have accomplished<WH6213> nothing.<WH3808>
"Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I shall wail<WH3213> for Moab,<WH4124> Even for all<WH3605> Moab<WH4124> shall I cry<WH2199> out; I will moan<WH1897> for the men<WH376> of Kir-heres.

"More<WH4480> than<WH4480> the weeping<WH1065> for Jazer<WH3270> I shall weep<WH1058> for you, O vine<WH1612> of Sibmah!<WH7643> Your tendrils<WH5189> stretched<WH5674> across<WH5674> the sea,<WH3220> They reached<WH5060> to the sea<WH3220> of Jazer;<WH3270> Upon your summer<WH7019> fruits<WH7019> and your grape<WH1210> harvest<WH1210> The destroyer<WH7703> has fallen.<WH5307>

"So gladness<WH8057> and joy<WH1524> are taken<WH622> away<WH622> From the fruitful<WH3759> field,<WH3759> even from the land<WH776> of Moab.<WH4124> And I have made the wine<WH3196> to cease<WH7673> from the wine<WH3342> presses;<WH3342> No<WH3808> one will tread<WH1869> [them] with shouting,<WH1959> The shouting<WH1959> will not be shouts<WH1959> [of joy.]

"From the outcry<WH2201> at Heshbon<WH2809> even to Elealeh,<WH500> even to Jahaz<WH3096> they have raised<WH5414> their voice,<WH6963> from Zoar<WH6820> even to Horonaim<WH2773> [and to] Eglath-shelishiyah; for even<WH1571> the waters<WH4325> of Nimrim<WH5249> will become<WH1961> desolate.<WH4923>

"And I shall make<WH7673> an end<WH7673> of Moab,<WH4124>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "the one who offers<WH5927> [sacrifice] on the high<WH1116> place<WH1116> and the one who burns<WH6999> incense<WH6999> to his gods.<WH430>

"Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> My heart<WH3820> wails<WH1993> for Moab<WH4124> like flutes;<WH2485> My heart<WH3820> also wails<WH1993> like flutes<WH2485> for the men<WH376> of Kir-heres. Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> they have lost the abundance<WH6> it produced.<WH3502>

"For every<WH3605> head<WH7218> is bald<WH7144> and every<WH3605> beard<WH2206> cut<WH1639> short;<WH1639> there are gashes<WH1417> on all<WH3605> the hands<WH3027> and sackcloth<WH8242> on the loins.<WH4975>

"On all<WH3605> the housetops<WH1406> of Moab<WH4124> and in its streets<WH7339> there<WH3605> is lamentation<WH4553> everywhere;<WH3605> for I have broken<WH7665> Moab<WH4124> like an undesirable<WH369> <WH2656> vessel,<WH3627>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"How<WH349> shattered<WH2865> it is! [How<WH349>] they have wailed!<WH3213> How Moab<WH4124> has turned<WH6437> his back<WH6203> – he is ashamed!<WH954> So Moab<WH4124> will become<WH1961> a laughingstock<WH7814> and an object<WH4288> of terror<WH4288> to all<WH3605> around<WH5439> him."
For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> one will fly<WH1675> swiftly<WH1675> like an eagle,<WH5404> And spread<WH6566> out his wings<WH3671> against<WH413> Moab.<WH4124>

"Kerioth<WH7152> has been captured<WH3920> And the strongholds<WH4679> have been seized,<WH8610> So the hearts<WH3820> of the mighty<WH1368> men<WH1368> of Moab<WH4124> in that day<WH3117> Will be like the heart<WH3820> of a woman<WH802> in labor.<WH9504>
"And Moab<WH4124> will be destroyed<WH8045> from [being] a people<WH5971> Because<WH3588> he has become<WH1431> arrogant<WH1431> toward<WH5921> the Lord.<WH3068>
"Terror,<WH6343> pit,<WH6354> and snare<WH6341> are [coming] upon you, O inhabitant<WH3427> of Moab,<WH4124>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"The one who flees<WH5127> from the terror<WH6343> Will fall<WH5307> into the pit,<WH6354> And the one who climbs<WH5927> up out of the pit<WH6354> Will be caught<WH3920> in the snare;<WH6341> For I shall bring<WH935> upon her, [even] upon Moab,<WH4124> The year<WH8141> of their punishment,<WH6486>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"In the shadow<WH6738> of Heshbon<WH2809> The fugitives<WH5127> stand<WH5975> without<WH4480> strength;<WH3581> For a fire<WH784> has gone<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from Heshbon,<WH2809> And a flame<WH3852> from the midst<WH996> of Sihon,<WH5511> And it has devoured<WH398> the forehead<WH6285> of Moab<WH4124> And the scalps<WH6936> of the riotous<WH7588> revelers.<WH1121> <WH7588>

"Woe<WH188> to you, Moab!<WH4124> The people<WH5971> of Chemosh<WH3645> have perished; For your sons<WH6> have been taken<WH1121> away captive,<WH3947> And your daughters<WH7628> into captivity.<WH1323>
"Yet I will restore<WH7725> the fortunes<WH7622> of Moab<WH4124> In the latter<WH319> days,<WH3117>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068> Thus<WH2008> far<WH5704> the judgment<WH4941> on Moab.<WH4124>
